statements: DELETE FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE organization = 'XYZ Corp';
DELETE FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE id = 1 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE organization = 'Tech Corp' AND (expertise = 'Cybersecurity' OR expertise = 'Data Privacy');
DELETE FROM digital_literacy_experts WHERE location = 'New York' AND expertise_area = 'Education';
DELETE FROM connections WHERE expert_id = 1 AND org_id = 1;
DELETE FROM connections WHERE connection_id = 100 AND connection_type = 'professional';
